segments.text: I hear scientists in the US have discovered a new AIDS vaccine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know . The report says it is better than the old vaccines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t count on it . I think the best way to prevent AIDS is to keep yourself clean by having clean sex and keeping a regular sex partner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . That ’ s why doctor say AIDS prevention means cleanness .
segments.speaker: S1
